data.question: What is the degree of a table with 1000 rows and 10 column ?

The set of attributes X ⊆ Schema (R) is a super key for relation schema R only if :
data.op1: For all relations r over R the number of tuples in projection over X of r is the same as the number of tuples in r
data.op2: All attributes of X are having non null values
data.op3: All attributes of X are having unique values

data.question: B+ Trees are preferred to binary trees since :
data.op1: Disk capacities are higher than memory capacities
data.op2: Memory access is faster than disk access
data.op3: Disk are more reliable than memory
data.op4: isk data transfer rates are much less than memory transfer rates
